data.title: Camden Computers LLC – Enterprise IT Solutions & Web Development
data.summary: Camden Computers LLC is a trusted IT solutions provider established in 1992, delivering comprehensive enterprise IT services, security solutions, and web development.

experienceSection.overview:
I designed and developed a modern, responsive website for Camden Computers LLC, a long-standing IT solutions provider offering enterprise services, security systems, and web development since 1992.

Built using Astro for speed and static-site performance, the site leverages TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for maintainability and clean structure. I integrated GSAP to deliver subtle motion and engaging UI interactions that reflect the brand's professionalism and reliability.

The goal was to create a site that's both performant and easy to navigate, optimized for SEO, accessibility, and future scalability. The result is a clean, fast-loading site that communicates trust and technical expertise to potential clients.

data.title: Del Val Media – Magazine Publisher & Digital Marketing Agency
data.summary: DelVal Media is a regional magazine publisher and digital marketing agency serving the Delaware Valley with lifestyle content and comprehensive advertising solutions.

data.title: Woodlynne Police Department
data.summary: This is the official website for the Woodlynne Police Department, serving the community of Woodlynne, New Jersey.

data.title: Xbox One Dashboard – UI Development & Prototyping Across Multiple Releases

experienceSection.overview: I helped shape the Xbox One Dashboard across its 2013 launch and major updates in 2015 and 2017, focusing on high-performance UI development and prototyping using XAML and MVVM.
bullets: Built core UI components for the Home, Community, Store, and One Guide dashboard panels
Developed and maintained Collection and Detail pages for games and apps, improving content discoverability and UX
Created interactive prototypes to validate design ideas, influence future updates, and accelerate production workflows
Applied XAML data binding and followed the MVVM architecture for scalable and maintainable front-end development
Used internal Xbox tools like Compass to build performant UIs optimized for TV screen environments

media.caption: Initial release of the Xbox One Dashboard
Initial release of the game store
Official video of the 2017 Dashboard update

sections.content: In addition to the dashboard, I also worked on the Collection and Detail pages for games and apps.

data.title: Microsoft Edge Browser – Web Components & UX Enhancements
data.summary: Microsoft Edge is a web browser developed by Microsoft. It is the default browser for Windows 10 and Windows 11.

experienceSection.overview: I built reusable, performant web components for Microsoft Edge using the FAST framework, extending Fluent UI Web Components to support key browser features.
bullets: Developing components for Edge Shopping (coupon, cashback, shopping-recommendation)
Iterating on the News Feed experience with article, info-pane-ad, and native-ad components
Enhancing Developer Tools accessibility for Windows high contrast mode
experienceSection.footer: These components are used in production across Edge, focusing on scalability, accessibility, and cross-team collaboration.

sections.content:
A feature to share multiple ways to help online shoppers save money.
Components built for this features are coupon, cashback and shopping-recommendation. The components are consumed and implemented by our developing partners.

The browser has a customizable news feed feature.
I helped iterate on the article, info-pane-ad and native-ad components, which are the main components you see on the feed.

Vertical tabs allows the users to dock their tabs on the side of the browser window.
I built a prototype to help the motion designer iterate on the slide out and in animation of the tab panel when it is in the collapsed state.

A big contribution to Edge and Chromium was making sure, when forced-colors mode, also known hasWindows high contrast mode, is enabled, the developer tools are visually accessible.
Consulting with the Edge dev tools and the Chromium team, I applied forced colors solutions to each developer tool elements that were visually broken in high contrast.

media.alt: Dev tools in high contrast mode
media.caption: High Contrast dark theme

data.title: FAST – UI Framework for Web
data.summary: FAST is dedicated to providing support for native Web Components and modern Web Standards, and it's designed to help you efficiently tackle some of the most common challenges in website and application design and development.

experienceSection.overview:
An open source project. I contributed to building and maintaining accessible components using React and Web Component technology.

Collaborate with design and engineering team to own, build and maintain Web Components for multiple web experiences for Microsoft Edge using the FAST and Fluent UI web components.

sections.content: Contributed and leading a few interns, in creating the FASTwebsite. Built the navigation and section-header components.

My biggest contribution was owning the high contrast work for both FAST and Fluent UI libraries. Made sure the components meet accessibility standards, I tested in high contrast, keyboard navigation, and screen readers, like Voice Over, Narrator and JAWS. Making sure FAST components are built to follow best practices and patterns from the ARIA Authoring Practice Guide I wrote up a document to help the open source community and internal partners, build accessible components with high contrast in mind.

data.title: The Recipe Room – Recipe Management System
data.summary: The Recipe Room app is a recipe management system that allows you to manage your recipes and ingredients.

experienceSection.overview:
I love cooking, and I often find inspiration and new recipe ideas while browsing the web and social media. In the past, I would save these recipes by bookmarking pages or taking screenshots. However, when I wanted to cook the same meal again, Id end up scrolling through countless images and bookmarks to find it. I built this web app to keep all my favorite recipes in one place, making it easy to organize and quickly find them whenever I’m ready to cook.

This is an ongoing personal project with new features currently in progress.

sections.content: I went with a vintage cookbook-style recipe collection app. This has a warm, nostalgic feel of an old-school cookbook with handwritten fonts, cream colors, and classic recipe card layout.
